entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
